aboutMeIntro: I'm Asadullah Kashif. I am a student of Computer Science from The National University of Sciences and Technology Islamabad expected to graduate in 2024

projects.title: Collaborative Code Editor
projects.desc: A web based editor that lets you collaborate on code, run it and see the output on the terminal screen below.

projects.title: Discord Music Bot
projects.desc: A discord music bot like Groovy, Rhythm etc. It would play music from YouTube to a discord voice channel. It could maintain a queue, repeat, skip, seek tracks etc.

projects.title: Chrome Extension
projects.desc: A Chrome Extension Live on the Chrome Store that makes filling Teacher's Review forms easier. It remembers user's preferences for later. And is currently rated 5-star
